title: calamu jEsina (pv)
sahitya:
calamu jEsina nIkEmi phalamu rA gOpAlabAla


P:  calamu jEsina nIkEmi phalamu rA gOpAlabAla
A:  kalanaina maravanivaina meruga vA Alasimpa sompA muraLIdhara
				(muktAyi svara)
cAlunikanu nI Atalu naTanalu mAni vaDi vaDiga maralu grahamunaku 
sarigalEni bhuvini pAlanamu sari cEyaga mAnavula bAdhala Nacaga 
				(ettugaDa)
nirupama guNa tEja sakalEsha karuNAkara
caraNam 1    cAru nayana vinIla maNi nibha 
 caraNam 2    natAvanamu niratamuna salupuduvu sadA ninu koluva mudA vahamagunu
 caraNam 3    vancana kaluSa bhAvanamu durusutanamu asahanamu manasunanu perigEnu 
arErE adi sari idi sari edi sari teliyaga jAlamu ika nIvE telupumu
 caraNam 4    dhAruNi vividha matamulu maThAdhIshulu mari vacana carutulu 
kaLA vidulu nidhi patulu naTa viTulu vividha kathakulu navalala cadavarulu
endaru pramukhulu vibudhulu kalarOkO evarunu phalitamani sariyaganu
teliyaru telupaga vipuluru bhaktini tamatama dhana mArgamunaku malaturu
